translation.initialMessage1: Welcome to the Magic Box Challenge! Ready to test your luck?
translation.initialMessage2: Click the boxes and discover the prizes waiting for you. Good luck!
translation.initialMessage3: Three boxes, three chances – will you hit the jackpot?
translation.initialMessage4: Let the fun begin: Open the boxes and reveal your fate!
translation.initialMessage5: Get ready to play! What surprises are hidden in the boxes today?
translation.playMessage2: Get ready to reveal your luck!
translation.playMessage5: Your symbols are on their way!
translation.playMessage7: Get set – the boxes are appearing!
translation.playMessage8: Your next chance is coming up!
translation.playMessage9: The excitement builds – here they are!
translation.playMessage10: The boxes are arriving – let’s go!
translation.winMessage2: You did it! A big win of {{prizeAmount}} for you!
translation.winMessage6: What a win! Celebrate your {{prizeAmount}} prize!
translation.winMessage8: Fantastic! You hit the prize of {{prizeAmount}}!
translation.winMessage9: Luck is on your side! You’ve won {{prizeAmount}}!
translation.winMessage10: Amazing result! Congratulations on your {{prizeAmount}} win!
